projects.title: Credit Risk Management
projects.description:
Bank  - Credit Risk Management - Monitoring all CRMS (Credit Risk Management Studio) process, data mart validation, risk weight calculation, create maps for Bank of Portugal and give access to results in SAS Information Delivery Portal and SAS Credit Risk Studio. Bank of Portugal report using Excel and we need to use DDE (Dynamic Data Exchange). 
This type of technology writes cell to cell from a SAS table in Excel. The challenge is run 84 balconies and two consolidation levels with less time and better performance.

projects.title: Scoring and Rating Models Monitorization
projects.description: Bank – Reporting - Scoring and Rating Models Monitorization – Create Reports in Business Intelligence Platform and publish then in Corporate Portal. This work involves another type of programming language (JAVA).

projects.title: Telecommunication Costs Reporting
projects.description:
Private  Security – Reporting - Allocate Telecommunication Costs to  departments uses different SAS Solutions. Increase their knowledge about the telecommunication costs generated by either Central (register all phone calls made) and/or by operators. These costs include voice, data and mobile internet. The aim would be comparing the durations of calls from operators, with the recording made by central (assessing whether the delays of length calls, and starts call). Simultaneously applying direct costs came from operators in a hierarchical structure, by department and user, and split indirect costs (those who can’t assign to any
department) in equal parts according to a simple algorithm of division and application of percentage 
resulting of monthly total expenses. This project is an example of success and used in another sales 
processes. We develop a package to implement directly in all clients that have problems with 
allocation costs with telephones and printers.

projects.title: Reporting Risk Department
projects.description: Bank – Reporting - Create Automatically Processes for Probably of Default and a lot of reports to Risk Department. All reports have been defined with client on real time. We develop batch processes with specific parameters that characterize all data. Its relevant to refer that is my first time involved with Project Management, coordinate a team and project finish on time.

projects.title: Data Modelling
projects.description: Bank – Data modelling - data model creation for SAS Marketing Automation (parallel CDM – Common Data Model) working with ETL (Extract – Transform – Load) and developed all processes in a Data Model;

projects.title: Bank of Portugal Reporting
projects.description: Bank – Reporting - create a data mart to capture all information, develop stored processes, create performance maps for validation and admission of internal models and compare results with other system implemented earlier. The results its better with our tool;

projects.title: Analytical Processes Documentation
projects.description:
Bank – Documentation of analytical processes – define the most 
appropriate approach to the Next Best Offer, to detail all the necessary processes and analytical 
models, and to provide the guidelines and best practices on model development and implementation.

projects.title: SAS Programming
projects.description: Industry – Programming - Create processes to adapt with SAS Forecast Server (forecast SAS tool);

projects.title: CRM Models Implementation
projects.description: Retail – Consulting - Data Marts creation inside a  business intelligence platform,  Create ABT (Analytical Base Table) and  analytical  models (Churn, MBA, Association, RFM segmentation). We improve their merchandising and marketing decisions including catalogue planning, assortment planning, and product placements in store displays;

projects.title: Implementing Financial Budgeting
projects.description:
Insurance – Consulting – Implementing Financial Budgeting - Create 
specific reports to financial  consolidation using SAS tool (SAS Financial Management), data management and special configurations adapting to insurance;

projects.title: Bank of Portugal Reporting
projects.description:
Bank of Portugal Reporting – creation and reporting 
maps to serve all needs for bank of Portugal based on international directives;

profile_positions.description:
We believe that people are tired of traveling like a tourist; they want to experience a city as a local which means not only being there to check the box, but to enjoy a city and new culture by interacting with people, experiencing local habits and get to know the hidden gems of the city. 

We provide our clients with these local experiences, so you won't have to do extensive research and still end up in a line or tourist trap. We recommend areas in the city that are unique (based on different factors) and we personalise packages, provide discounts, smells, tastes, views and much more. 

You will not be disappointed, because once we know you, we adjust our advise to your needs. And Amsterdam has something special for everyone; we guarantee you will always remember your Amsterdam experience as the local feeling.
profile_positions.title: Co-founder & IT Manager

profile_positions.description:
I believe that to be good in something is not enough. 
Doing what you love is what makes your heart beat, and this is my biggest challenge nowadays. 

I am passionate about traveling and everything that involves communication & interaction.
